channel.title: How do you change the login screen?
channel.description: What area is the begining login in? I want to change, when you log in it has the banner on top, it says your rep, and it shows the latest update. How do I change the banner at the top?

item.title: How do you change the login screen?
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

search in your client.java for you’re current banned then for rep, change it to

sendQuest("Reputation: @whi@"+Rep, 15952);

and you’re current banned should be like this

sendQuest("~ Augeas Pkz ~", 15950);

Just not augeas pkz, gl hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the login screen?
